    F

    FILLED - Enum constant in enum class entity.InternshipStatus
    Internship posting has reached its maximum capacity of confirmed slots.
    filterEligibleVisibleOpen(List) - Method in class entity.Student
    Filters a list of internships to show only those the student is eligible for, that are currently visible, and open for applications.
